text:
Jan Henry Tungeland Olsen (20 August 1956 – 10 July 2018) was a Norwegian politician. He was a member of the Labour Party. He was Minister of Fisheries from 1992 to 1996. He was born in Tromsø, Norway.
Olsen was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease in 2008. He died from the disease under hospice carer in Tromsø on 10 July 2018, aged 61.
